Articles.Content:
Hi,

I’m moving into a property that I bought and I’m looking at buying furniture that isn’t too expensive because we’ve spent a lot on it over the past few weeks so even a little bit of stuff we can install.  

Thanks for helping!
Appliances or furniture? What part of the world are you in?

Try craigslist, facebook marketplace, local ads for yardsales and goodwill stores. If money is in short supply you can’t beat pre-owned and you often can get it for next to nothing as people just want to get rid of it.
Be careful of used upholstered goods though unless you know they've been treated. Def don't want to bring bedbugs into your home.
